body_html:
Well, I wrote some reparametrisations for statistical distributions.
In theory, such an auto-solver could be used to automatically optimize conversions between different parametrization types.
However, I simply had not the time and desire to add an additional library and figure out how to use it, only to tweak some calculations automatically.

body:
Well, I wrote some reparametrisations for statistical distributions.
In theory, such an auto-solver could be used to automatically optimize conversions between different parametrization types.
However, I simply had not the time and desire to add an additional library and figure out how to use it, only to tweak some calculations automatically.
